headline: Vortex Energy Successfully Deploys ANT Sensors at Robinsons River Salt Project
summary: Vortex Energy Advancing Subsurface Imaging at the Robinsons River Salt ProjectVANCOUVER, British Columbia, Aug. 14, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Vortex Energy Corp. (CSE: VRTX) (OTC: VTECF) (FSE: AA3) (“Vortex” or the “Company”) is pleased to announce that all Ambient Noise Tomography (“ANT”) sensors have been successfully deployed across the Robinsons River Salt Project, located in Newfoundland and Labrador. This milestone follows the August 5, 2025 announcement of crew mobilization for the survey.
